g1.title: Grid Room 1
text: A quiet northern corner of a small test grid.

g2.title: Grid Room 2
text: You see ways west, southwest, and south.

goblin: The bonfire spits and cracks, casting jagged teeth of light.
The smoke smells like old caves and warm blood.
human: Everything in this forest feels suspiciously normal.
You swear someone arranged these logs on purpose.
elf: A serene flame dances with perfect rhythm.
The air glows with a faint ancient warmth.

g4.title: Grid Room 4
text: The southeast corner — a quiet testing room.
